definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Unexploded bombs still lie buried deep in the earth.
sentences.chinese: 好些未爆彈仍深埋在土裏。

sentences.english: Hot Streak now also affects Living Bomb.
sentences.chinese: 現在活體爆彈也會影響這個天賦。

sentences.english: Wife: I realized that my husband died because of UXO.
sentences.chinese: 我知道丈夫是因爲未爆彈而死的。

sentences.english: Vietnam is still suffering from unexploded bombs and mines.
sentences.chinese: 越南人仍在經受未爆彈和地雷的折磨。
